widget.para: I am a Bharatiya scholar. I'm a Full Stack Web Developer, UI/UX Designer, YouTuber, Filmmaker. I have an adventurous life and a lots of experiences. I love to research things by digging deep onto the topics. My fields of expertise are Web Development, Network Architecture, Computer Architecture, Blockchain, Web-3 etc. And I'm also pretty much into Physics, Psychology, Philosophy, Geo-Politics, Economics, Socialism.
